entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 9:16 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

Temperature: -22.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
